name: Laboratory Tests
description: Learn about medical tests,check to see if treatment is working, or monitor the condition over time. A doctor may order these tests as part of a routine checkup, to check for certain diseases and disorders, or to monitor your health.

name: Imaging & Other Diagnostic Tests
description: Medical imaging is the technique and process of imaging the interior of a body for clinical analysis and medical intervention, as well as visual representation of the function of some organs or tissues (physiology).

name: Medical Services
description: Medical services means medical and health care services provided to a Person, including, but not limited to, medical and health care services provided to a Person which are covered by a policy of insurance, and includes, without limitation, physician services, nurse and therapist services, dental services

name: Home Health Check Up
description: A customized health check tailored around your needs that includes 20 lab tests and one video consultation with a Praava Family Doctor. With a single call, we will be at your doorstep to collect your sample anywhere within Dhaka.

name: Pharmacy
description: Popular Medicine corner is a well-known retailer of medicine in Bangladesh. We provide all kinds of life saving medicine, which are available in all branches of Popular Diagnostics Ltd. Our aim is to provide good medicine and best service quality to the patients.

name: Video consultation benefits
